english.segment1: Holy one, we come in Your honor. Show Your blessing and favor upon us. Our hearts are heavy and spirits are tired. But in Your glory well walk through the fire.
english.segment2: Bring to our lives a sense of your calling. Hear our cries to be completely healed. In Your eyes well discover the meaning of your unending grace. Were desperate for a taste. Were longing for the place where Your glory dwells.
english.segment3: Precious one, we bow in Your presence. Hands outstretched in a holy expectance. Desperately pleading for restoration to empty hearts. And a broken nation
